name: Performapal Sky Magician
effectText: Once per turn, if you activate a Spell Card: This card gains 300 ATK. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Continuous Spell you control; return it to the hand, then you can activate 1 "Magician" Continuous Spell from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Performapal Sky Magician" once per turn. If this face-up card leaves the field: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
